forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
